Google CEO Eric Schmidt said in a press conference that the legislation would establish a new and enforceable prohibition against discrimination for wireline and broadband Internet services, specifically, no discrimination against or prioritizing of lawful Internet content apps or services in a way that harms users or competition, no blocking or degrading of Internet content and applications. Some experts say the proposal could help produce a real resolution on net neutrality.
